name: Chocolate Caramel Filled Cake
author: Karen M.
instructions: Melt caramels and butter in large saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat; stir in Eagle brand milk until smooth. Prepare cake mix according to package directions. Pour 2 cups of batter into a 9 x 13 inch baking pan, coated with cooking spray. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes. Spread caramel mixture over cake; pour remaining cake batter over caramel mixture, top with nuts. Continue to bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes or until done. Cool and cut into squares to serve.
